response.answer_text: The RENIXX® (Renewable Energy Industrial Index, ISIN: DE000RENX014) World is the first global stock index for the renewable-energy industry and was designed by the IWR, a renewable energy institute, in 2005-2006.
Rennix is a topographic surname, which was given to a person who resided near a physical feature such as a hill, stream, church, or type of tree.
